Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Board of the game, including a deck of Cards, a map of all Rooms, and direct references to the 'Trailers' and 'Casting Office' Rooms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Board()
      This constructor simply starts the process of reading all Card and Room information from the game's XML files.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Room getCastingOffice()
      Gets the direct reference to the 'Casting Office' Room to check if a Player can upgrade their rank.
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
      Gets the ArrayList of Cards, used to determine the movie on a particular Set.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Room> getRooms()
      Gets the HashMap of Rooms, used to navigate around this Board.
      Room getTrailers()
      Gets the direct reference to the 'Trailers' Room for when Player positions are reset at the end of each day in the game.
      int[] getUpgradeCreditPrices()
      Gets the array of credit rank upgrade pricing, used when a Player upgrades their rank.
      int[] getUpgradeDollarPrices()
      Gets the array of dollar rank upgrade pricing, used when a Player upgrades their rank.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
